LanguageData.Axi_AR_PDR_21CA.label: Magpul PDR
LanguageData.Axi_AR_PDR_21CA.description: Previously an unreleased prototype, Magpul's PDR, or Personal Defense Rifle, turns the concept of a PDW on its head by utilizing bullpup weapon design and standard rifle ammunition to place assault rifle capabilities into a tiny package. For this reason, boarding parties around the cluster have gravitated towards it for clearing the tight confines of spacefaring vessels.
LanguageData.Axi_AR_PDR_21CA.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.Axi_AR_PDR_21CA.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.Axi_AR_PDR_21CA.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Magpul PDR
LanguageData.Bullet_PDR_21CA.label: PDR bullet
